title: Restaurant Preparation Routine
description: A calming routine to help your child prepare for restaurant visits
when_to_use: 15-20 minutes before leaving for a restaurant

steps.title: Deep Pressure Hug
steps.description: Give your child a firm, 10-second hug while they take deep breaths

steps.title: Wall Push-Ups
steps.description: Have your child do 5 wall push-ups against a wall

steps.title: Chair Squeezes
steps.description: Sit in a chair and squeeze the armrests for 10 seconds, release, repeat 3 times

steps.title: Deep Breathing
steps.description: Take 5 deep breaths: inhale for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 4

steps.title: Quiet Time
steps.description: Sit quietly for 2 minutes, feeling calm and ready

title: Restaurant Fidget Kit
description: Create a portable fidget kit for restaurant visits
when_to_use: When waiting for food or feeling restless at restaurants

steps.title: Choose Fidget
steps.description: Select one fidget toy from your kit

steps.title: Squeeze Ball
steps.description: Squeeze the stress ball 10 times with each hand

steps.title: Spin Fidget
steps.description: Use the fidget spinner quietly for 1 minute

steps.title: Switch Hands
steps.description: Try the fidget with your other hand

steps.title: Put Away
steps.description: Gently put the fidget back in your kit

title: Calming Bedtime Routine
description: A structured routine to help your child settle for sleep

steps.title: Gentle Massage
steps.description: Give a 2-minute gentle massage with lotion on arms and legs

steps.title: Deep Pressure
steps.description: Apply gentle pressure to shoulders and back for 1 minute

steps.title: Weighted Blanket
steps.description: Lie under a weighted blanket and take 5 deep breaths

steps.title: Quiet Music
steps.description: Listen to soft, calming music for 3 minutes

steps.title: Final Relaxation
steps.description: Lie still and feel the calm for 2 minutes

title: Transition Warning System
description: A visual and verbal system to prepare for transitions

steps.title: Set Timer
steps.description: Set a 5-minute timer and show it to your child

steps.title: Verbal Warning
steps.description: Say 'In 5 minutes, we will [next activity]'

steps.title: Show Transition Object
steps.description: Hold up a special object that represents the next activity

steps.title: 2-Minute Warning
steps.description: When timer shows 2 minutes left, give another warning

steps.title: Final Countdown
steps.description: Count down from 10 to 1, then transition

title: Focus Break Activities
description: Quick movement breaks to help maintain focus

steps.title: Jumping Jacks
steps.description: Do 10 jumping jacks to get energy moving

steps.title: Wall Push-Ups
steps.description: Do 5 wall push-ups for heavy work

steps.title: Chair Squeezes
steps.description: Squeeze chair arms for 10 seconds, release, repeat 3 times

steps.title: Deep Breathing
steps.description: Take 3 deep breaths to reset

steps.title: Return to Work
steps.description: Sit back down and return to focused activity

title: Meltdown Prevention Routine
context: When showing early signs of overwhelm
when_to_use: At first signs of overwhelm or frustration

steps.title: Move to Quiet Space
steps.description: Go to a quiet, calm area away from stimulation

steps.title: Deep Pressure Hug
steps.description: Give a firm, calming hug for 15 seconds

steps.title: Weighted Blanket
steps.description: Wrap in a weighted blanket and sit quietly

steps.title: Slow Breathing
steps.description: Take 5 slow breaths: inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4

steps.title: Gentle Rocking
steps.description: Rock gently back and forth for 2 minutes

title: Quiet Restaurant Activities
description: Silent activities to keep occupied at restaurants

steps.title: Draw Shapes
steps.description: Draw different shapes in your notebook

steps.title: Trace Lines
steps.description: Trace your finger along the edge of the table

steps.title: Fidget Play
steps.description: Use a small, quiet fidget toy

steps.title: Count Objects
steps.description: Count items around you (chairs, people, etc.)

steps.title: Deep Breathing
steps.description: Take 3 quiet deep breaths

title: Sensory Bedtime Activities
description: Sensory activities to prepare for sleep

steps.title: Gentle Brushing
steps.description: Use a soft brush to gently brush arms and legs

steps.title: Lotion Massage
steps.description: Apply lotion with gentle massage strokes

steps.title: Quiet Music
steps.description: Listen to soft, calming music

steps.title: Deep Pressure
steps.description: Apply gentle pressure to shoulders and back

steps.title: Final Relaxation
steps.description: Lie still and feel completely relaxed

title: Transition Movement Break
description: Movement activities to help with transitions

steps.title: March in Place
steps.description: March in place for 30 seconds

steps.title: Jumping
steps.description: Do 10 small jumps

steps.title: Wall Push-Ups
steps.description: Do 5 wall push-ups

steps.title: Deep Breathing
steps.description: Take 3 deep breaths

steps.title: Move to Next Activity
steps.description: Walk to the next activity with energy

steps.title: Choose Fidget
steps.description: Select a quiet fidget toy

steps.title: Squeeze Ball
steps.description: Squeeze stress ball 10 times

steps.title: Fidget Play
steps.description: Use fidget toy for 1 minute

steps.title: Switch Hands
steps.description: Try with other hand

steps.title: Return to Work
steps.description: Put fidget away and continue work

title: Meltdown Recovery Routine
description: Activities to help recover after a meltdown

steps.title: Quiet Space
steps.description: Go to a quiet, calm area

steps.title: Drink Water
steps.description: Sip water slowly and calmly

steps.title: Weighted Blanket
steps.description: Wrap in weighted blanket and rest

steps.title: Gentle Touch
steps.description: Receive gentle back rubs or hand holding

steps.title: Slow Breathing
steps.description: Practice slow, deep breathing
